headline: SBA Communications Corporation to Speak at Citi’s 2025 Global TMT Conference and the BofA Securities 2025 Media, Communications and Entertainment Conference
summary: BOCA RATON, Fla., August 20, 2025--SBA Communications Corporation (NASDAQ: SBAC) ("SBA") announces that Marc Montagner, Chief Financial Officer, is scheduled to speak at Citi’s 2025 Global TMT Conference, Wednesday, September 3, 2025, at 12:50 PM ET. The conference will be held at The New York Hilton Midtown in New York.
